data.description: Interface to UPS new XML shipping interface
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module uses the XML interface to UPS to get rates. Existing
    modules like Business::UPS and
    Business::Shipping::RateRequest::Online::UPS use other interfaces to
    get rates.

    I chose the Business::Shipping::UPS_XML name space to follow the
    existing naming scheme of simular UPS modules. Also this module will
    normally be uses by businesses with an account with UPS for the
    purpose of shipping.
